website_summaries.verdict: A professional manicure table with an affordable price. The spacious tabletop is perfect for keeping all of your items organized.
pros: Space-saving design with foldable, supportive metal legs and removable wrist cushion
Comes with a waterproof zippered carrying bag
cons: Good for those who need to travel with it, but not the best for long-term durability

customer_reviews.title: A great Table
customer_reviews.text: I am a licensed Cosmetologist. When I read the other reviews I decided to give this a try as I am wanting to get my business off the ground with minimal expense. It is perfect. Was easy to put together and the drawer is a good size. The reviews that say the drawer is wrong, it’s only goes in the wrong direction if that is how you put it together. Only complaint I have is that the instructions are pictures. That is it. It isn’t built like a heavy duty truck, but it is well enough to get the job done. Shouldn’t be leaning on it anyway is my thought. If you’re doing nails this really is a good table.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Great table, comes in a gazellion pieces
customer_reviews.text: Excellent work table. Perfect for many crafts. However, i hope you are mechanically inclined as it is in a lot of pieces .haha. comes with all you need, except a phillips screwdriver. Thank goodness i have one lying around. No i don't usually put tables together. I'm writing this as to let others know to be prepared.
customer_reviews.author: DreamyJeanie

customer_reviews.title: Happy Wife
customer_reviews.text: My wife wasn't happy about how expensive it was getting to do her nails every three weeks. I got this for her for Christmas. She loves it. She now does her own nails and the nails of her friends and family members. It gives her some girl time and got me some serious brownie points.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I really like this table. I thought I put it together right at first and it was crooked but then I took a longer look and realized I put the legs on wrong. I fixed it and its now perfect. Make sure you figure out the instructions right or it might come out very wrong. it would be nice if the instructions were written out with words and pictures instead of just having pictures. I would recommend this table its just right for doing nails at home.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Jojola

customer_reviews.title: So far  happy
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my table with the best price. You do need to Assemble but it was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Blackorchid

customer_reviews.title: Overall amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and easy to assemble . You do need your own screw driver in order to build it
customer_reviews.author: nat99

customer_reviews.title: cute and perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping sooner than I expected very well-made just as the picture I'm very happy with this nail table A++++ don't have to do nothing just open the box take it out and open the legs that easy 😊
customer_reviews.author: Nevaeh

customer_reviews.title: Completely going to fall apart b4 the end of the year bet
customer_reviews.text: Actually it was a bit difficult to assemble as the drawer rails to the table don't clarify what way they go causing confusion as to what size screw driver is needed to manually screw the screws through both holes. It only comes with select instructions and a small wrench but needs a Phillips head screwdriver just a FYI. Also ist made of particle board NOT ReAL Wood Wich can cause the screws to unhinge after so many portable uses. Causing loose screws in the entire unit to pull away from wood and materials to fall apart
customer_reviews.author: amanda swarts

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great size! I'm a nail tech and needed a portable table for the price you can't beat this one. So far it's very durable.. It's also lightweight and easy to take down and set up. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Pucciarelli

customer_reviews.title: Great table assembly required
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe this table was only 50 bucks it’s really great quality. That being said, for some reason the pictures made me think this required no assembly...this needs a LOT of assembly and some tools required. Kind of irritated about all the assembly, I was under the impression I could pop this open and go. But it’s a great table especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LeGreta

customer_reviews.title: CAME NEW , BUILD , AND READY TO GO !
customer_reviews.text: THIS TABLE IS AMAZING FOR ANYONE !! Beginnings or not !! I just received it today , 2 days later , and it is awesome. Thing is all I did was open the box , thinking I had to put it together because MOST of the comments say putting it together was a struggle , was not my problem?! My came BUILD , BRAND NEW , PUT TOGETHER in a box already 😊 so all I had to do was remove the protection wrap from it and open it and BOOM ! And all set to go ! It’s a PERFECT size for anyone . HIGHY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: SLANTED TABLE BUT FIXABLE
customer_reviews.text: The table slanted . I’m going to have to send this thing back unfortunately. I spent all that time putting it together only to find out it slanted to one side!! Please beware of this. I seen some reviewers realizing they put the legs on wrong and that’s why the table slanted . I fixed my slanted table by screwing the wheels on one side only. It’s definitely not slanted anymore
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! DOES NOT COME WITH ALL PARTS!
customer_reviews.text: I am an at-home/travel nail tech. I bought this table for obvious reasons, but I should have looked through all of the reviews first. I received only one kind of screw for this table (that is too short), but according to the PICTURE instructions, I should have another kind of screw. I now do not have a table and I was relying on this item. I now have to wait for the seller to review my refund request and figure out a way to fit it back in the box. This is completely ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Ok but
customer_reviews.text: It’s what I needed but for this price , I expected better instructions. This was ridiculous trying to put together & its still a little off. It’s worth the money but I found a great desk for $10 more locally so I was bummed out getting this
customer_reviews.author: Shakeyla Williams

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the photo
customer_reviews.text: Table is over priced looks just like the photo. When received one wheel was broken. They need to come up with a lighter design too heavy to be a portable table also was hard to put together. Looks nice wish it was taller. Arm rest is big and bulky. Drawer they gave is pointless have to take it out when closing and putting into the bag provided. Bag is cheaply made I’m sure the zipper will break and get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Oldham

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bad sellers
customer_reviews.text: I think that this could have been a great product. If only the sellers would do things right. I was so excited to get this table, only to find that, despite other reviews, it did not come assembled and it was definitely not easy to assemble. The wood part of the table only had dots that marked where the nails should go. The instructions came along. But it wasn't much help considering the nails would only go so far. So this made for a very unstable table.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Guzman

customer_reviews.title: The screws aren’t very strong enough to hold the table together.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this manicure table...it's excalty what I needed... Perfect for doing nails!!💗💗💗💗But , unfortunately the nails aren’t strong enough to hold the table, they fell out within a month.. So , I had to glue the table together. So, I will be ordering another one , that’s much stronger.
customer_reviews.author: TinaKyereboah

customer_reviews.title: Where are all the parts. 🤦🏾‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: I’m a nail tech and I was so excited to get the table but to my surprise I have to put the table together and all the pieces I need are not included in the box I’m so upset I really need this table asap
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Scott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for at home use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for at home use. Pros: has the perfect amount of work space, easy to assemble. Cons: One of the legs is slightly shorter than the other. Didn't make a big deal about it, as this is for home use and I had already put together. Make sure your holes are where they should be.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer NWA

customer_reviews.title: Slanted & Defective
customer_reviews.text: Disappointment is an understatement. I honestly was so excited to receive this nail desk but as you can see, it came defective. I thought I was setting it up wrong but no, turns out one piece comes wayyy shorter than the other. I have it propped up on a piece of wood to level the slanted side. Also the cushion came kind of dented which sucks bc I was expecting it to at least be in perfect shape considering I spent my hard earned money on this. Nonetheless, I do like the size and it’s a good desk to start my nail journey with.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Almeida

customer_reviews.title: Nice nail table.
customer_reviews.text: Love the table easy to put together but missing parts and inadequate parts. But other than that great nail table.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: I love this!!
customer_reviews.text: This table is the perfect size for my small New York apartment! IRS strong and durable. Though my table is out for use it stores easily and the bag it comes with can hold other things while traveling like my UV lamp and drying fan. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: LaToya Johnson

customer_reviews.title: yesss must buy
customer_reviews.text: not only am i please about this item!! I'm in awe about how quickly it got shipped to home..it said on the tracking i'd receive it in about 4 days!!! but ended up getting an alert from Alexa that it was being delivered the next day!..and it sure did arrive the next day super pleased with this company and with my super sweet manicuring table ..thank you guys so much!.. i will add photo later today
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: It's a gift for someone starting their own salon, and they had asked specifically for this model. But when they got it out of the package and set it up they found that it was not at all sturdy and not at all what a salon needs.
customer_reviews.author: Wrkn Hrd

customer_reviews.title: too expensive
customer_reviews.text: This table is ok the drawer is plastic and you can’t even use it it’s super hard and it gets stuck when you try to use it when I push it the wheels don’t even move the wood is cheap wood they use I don’t think it’s worth the $80 I totally regret buying this table I would return it but I know what a hassle it will be to do so so with that being said ladies save your money just buy s regular table and use that for your manicures not worth no $80 more like $30.
customer_reviews.author: brendalis

customer_reviews.title: Good but not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this could have came assembled... but it does the job
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Alejandra Cortez Tartaglia

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This desk is perfect if you are looking for a portable nail desk! It didn't take too long to assemble and the directions were pretty clear! I'm glad that I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry and fits in my trunk perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I just got my table a couple of days ago. Easy to carry and fits in my trunk perfectly. The only problem is that my drawer was built on the wrong end of the table. It pulls out toward the client side. But its a good and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Ayala

customer_reviews.title: LOPSIDED 👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave the table 2 stars cause for the price you would think it would be perfect. But the one that was sent to me was defective. It being lopsided made me annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Divine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for the price. Easy to store and compact. Perfect for doing nails. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: My wife Loved the table. A little time consuming to assemble and one of the wheels came cracked. Deff need too look into replacement wheels now. :( overall my wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Leoner Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Table for at home Nail Tech
customer_reviews.text: This table is fantastic for an at-home nail table. Perfect for DIYers, Nail Tech students, anyone looking to have a functional table that folds and is easy to store. Its sturdy, thick enough table top, ir locks easily, and being able to lock all 4 wheels is clutch. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It came earlier then expected I finally build it and the cut is all off.. one leg is higher then the other and my table is basically leaning by a whole inch very disappointing because I had clients coming and I don’t have the proper equipment
customer_reviews.author: anabella Torres

customer_reviews.title: If you notice the legs are super stiff to fold and unfold
customer_reviews.text: Overall my wife loves it. It does not fold completely flat due to the design of the legs, but not that big of a deal. If you notice the legs are super stiff to fold and unfold, you will want to loosen the tension on them a little or you risk pulling the mounting screws right out of the table.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Conner

customer_reviews.title: Carry bag and pad for customers arm support
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves her new table as she prepares to get back into the game of doing nails as a side job. Love the portability and that it can with a bag. Only problem is the tray has to be taking all the way out to get to any of her tools that she may in it. Besides that it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: dcheeks30

customer_reviews.title: Choose Your Poison I do painting on mine, What will you do?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a personal art table and it’s just the thing!! I do my diamond art & I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this one with the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley A Mason

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality control. Went to put it together and the leg wheel screw hole was completely blocked with a piece of metal inside. Returning
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a cute table. Does what it is designed for. Good for the price, I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Linh Kelly

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table so much! It is nice and small and simple just how I wanted it. I saw some reviews that said it came assembled and others that said that it did not come assembled. Mine came assembled!! All I had to do was take it out the box and boom. Done. 5 stars for me!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lee M.

customer_reviews.title: I didn't expect that this would come already assembled. ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect that this would come already assembled. It's so lightweight too, and even came with a carrying case!
customer_reviews.author: H. Halliday Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy .... disappointment
customer_reviews.text: As A Self Taught Nail Tech I’m Really Mad I Brought This Table It’s Far From Sturdy , It Leans To One Side , I have to put books to level it which just looks unappealing & is definitely a hazard , idk who needs to hear this but just send the extra money and get you a good quality table cause I’m sure this won’t even last a few months
customer_reviews.author: Valerie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for months and it was def worth the money! Easy to assemble and good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A. Marie

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My table is perfect and it was easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money and VERY easy to assemble. Directions were very easy to follow and a breeze to put table together. Looking forward to using with my family. DIY'R and this is PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uneven table.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a regular shopper at amazon and this is the second time I receive defect product not only that but my box also came damaged. I did not write a bad review the first time but come on now?? Highly dissatisfied and highly upset.
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: It was missing like 10 of the screws. And it was way too heavy for me to send back on my own so now it’s just sitting in storage until I can get my boyfriend to take me to find screws for it. Really annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lopsided table
customer_reviews.text: The table is okay, however it was very hard to put together. The instructions are only pictures not words. One of the table legs are longer than the other so the table is lopsided. It’s not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Tamiameme

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Worked well now I do nails in accent to give it a more authentic feel
customer_reviews.author: Sergio E. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rolling Manicure Table
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived assembled! No work needed on my part once I took all the tape and package warp off. Also it arrived fast and well packaged. The carrying case is all black, cones with handles, and zips close.
customer_reviews.author: Wynter

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this October 10 and it came 5 days later!!! I’m a impatient person so for it to come so fast is a blessing. Since I just got it I can’t say if it’s da best or da worst yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jaina douzable

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The table is pretty good quality but the parts that attach the legs to the table top are uneven which makes the whole thing lopsided. Kinda disappointed and frustrated because now I gotta figure out, how I can make it even without making it look tacky.
customer_reviews.author: Daisuniqueh

customer_reviews.title: Should’ve listened to the reviews...
customer_reviews.text: First time I unfolded it the screws holding the leg to the table pulled out of the wood... it’s completely overpriced for how cheaply made it is. I was able to screw it back in by making new holes an inch away from the original holes but I will never risk folding it up again.
customer_reviews.author: Jaquie

customer_reviews.title: very good  enough for price!
customer_reviews.text: happy I got this! good shape,easy to fold, not too heavy but stable! I only wish the rollers roll well. they barely roll and left back mark on floor ( came off easily so it's ok)
customer_reviews.author: Sh

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice for beginners but you going to have to upgrade
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice but regret wasting my money rather than saving up for better table
customer_reviews.author: Carmen MIchelle Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Legs are uneven causes the table to lean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together you don’t need a drill but when I assembled it one side is higher than the other
customer_reviews.author: Awesome buyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for manicurist
customer_reviews.text: Use this for doing nails. I love it. Perfect size. Easy assemble
customer_reviews.author: Alicia F.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m a new upcoming nail tech I bought this table to do nails on and when I went to put it together most of the items are missing and the screws that came in the box is not the correct screws for the table...I wish I would of read the reviews before I bought this...very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Asia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, I like the height.. wish it could be just a lil bit taller but it's great
customer_reviews.author: kimmy poo

customer_reviews.title: UNEVEN
customer_reviews.text: After building it is clearly uneven This is so inconvenient I’m going to have to put a book on one side so that it can even out
customer_reviews.author: kei

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like it just fine. A little small. Not the easiest to put together but I managed. But I’m using it pretty frequently and the price was right
customer_reviews.author: jennifer jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great table. Easy to build
customer_reviews.text: Great table . Easy to build. A little heavy as a portable item, but it’s sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Upset.
customer_reviews.text: It’s completely slanted. One leg is way longer then the other. I was really excited about this purchase and now that it’s here I honestly am extremely disappointed. I can say it was delivered mighty quick and it doesn’t take up Space.
customer_reviews.author: Jannell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great little table and the price is awesome. Giving three stars because the instructions for attaching the brackets that hold the drawers the backwards causing the drawer to open up on the wrong side of the table. Just reverse whatever the directions say if you want it right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing table
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble !!!!!! Loving my table its amazing and its kidney shape allows it to fit in small places 😘😍
customer_reviews.author: Letty

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like the locking wheels and the fact that there was no assembly required.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great quality, except I dislike the little draw it comes with. If you open it too slightly it’ll come off. Very annoying
customer_reviews.author: Pink_Kitty_K

customer_reviews.title: Not too big, not too small. Lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Finally put it together and used it last night. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: The holes are too small , but the table is very nice
customer_reviews.text: Ending results are great , love the table . But when you are building the table the holes are way too small , took a lot of work. You need a drill , and I didn't have one. So it took forever. My arm rest thing , was messed up as well.
customer_reviews.author: sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect to be that small but it’s ok
customer_reviews.author: Andriana

customer_reviews.title: ITS MOT EVEN, it’s LEANING, AND MISSING SCREWS
customer_reviews.text: My table is uneven!! I can’t work on this I waited almost 3 weeks for this just for the reviews to be true!! And I’m missing 4 screws!!! I was so excited now I’m just disappointed! I need my 128 I paid to get a ACTUAL Table I can use
customer_reviews.author: Meme

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE
customer_reviews.text: love this table is super comfortable fits all things the most I like is that I can take it to work in the homes of my clients
customer_reviews.author: Joyanne

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a good nail desk. It did take a long time to get though
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne lopez

customer_reviews.title: perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: gets the job done, rolling wheels are a little tight, hoping that will clear up as I use it more. So far so good! I've read other reviews of theirs being crooked, mine is not.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Wandahsega

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. My only complaint is that the arm rest doesn’t attach at all to the table.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy and Emily

customer_reviews.title: Literally useless.
customer_reviews.text: The legs are 2 different lengths causing the table to be completely uneven. Didnt find out till after an hour putting together. Over a hundred dollars for this thing and it is useless
customer_reviews.author: Rhyan Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Descent beginners table for nail techs
customer_reviews.text: Table is uneven. One leg is longer than the other. I bought something to go under the other side to keep it balanced. Nothing came with arm rest to keep it in place I bought my own supply to place it down
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Low-quality table. The price for this table is very high
customer_reviews.text: The table is of very poor quality. Swayings. Weak attachment. I am disappointed with this purchase. I will no longer order this particular model. It took me a long time to deliver it. The price is very high. Very sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Olesia

customer_reviews.title: Not level ☹️
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time & in good condition. Happy with the table for the price. However it’s not level, like by an inch. So I have to take wheels off at one end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are not the best,one table leg exactly two inches longer than the other,and table is rather small
customer_reviews.author: Lacresha

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love My Nail Desk!
customer_reviews.text: This nail desk is perfect and best of all it was already assembled! Absolutely love! Be sure to pick the one no assembly required. It arrived super fast!
customer_reviews.author: Adriane E. Jolly

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED A DRILL
customer_reviews.text: I love the material of the table it seem ok but I need a drill to put this together im so mad about that because as a women I can’t put this together with out a drill and that’s very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: El beeh

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: Product came all broken up no assembly or partial assembly at at def not worth the money screws where missing I had to piece it together and I will have to purchase another table somewhere else
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bush

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected
customer_reviews.text: Came sooner then I thought. It’s perfect and nice, a little lower then I thought it was going to be but I can still work with that. I recommend this too Beginners, it’s fast and travel size too
customer_reviews.author: Asia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners and small spaces
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner nail tech this table fit perfectly in my study room. You will need a bit of strength to put together but it's so easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Mendez

customer_reviews.title: The legs were uneven I had to ship it back ...
customer_reviews.text: The legs were uneven I had to ship it back and if you have to ship it back for any reason the shipping fee comes out of your pocket so I actually lost out on money.
customer_reviews.author: kh

customer_reviews.title: It's going to have to do, but I hate that it doesn't sir leveled
customer_reviews.text: I like the desk, but once assembled, it isn't leveled correctly! This is a huge turn-off for me!

customer_reviews.title: Came with no screws!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm super upset not a happy customer it came with no screws how am I to put this together!!!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was lopsided until I realized that I put it together wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the product. I put the table together to get to the end and reliezed one leg is shorter then the other. This means the holes on each leg is not exact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved her present she uses it quite a bit easy fold and light
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have used this table several times. Works great and I would recommend this for portable manicure

customer_reviews.title: Missing all screws except small ones
customer_reviews.text: I received the table with one pack of screws (16 small ones) and that’s it. How am I suppose to put the table together without the parts??? Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Not study uneven
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the table. It’s the perfect size but I’m very dissatisfied in my purchase. One side is longer than the other and it’s not sturdy at all.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy for my take along, but also very handy and well made.

customer_reviews.title: Needed directions
customer_reviews.text: There were no instructions .... I’m trying to figure it out ... annoying to say the least!

customer_reviews.title: ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not worth the money can get cheaper at walmart! not as sturdy neither!

customer_reviews.text: Screws came with but not according to assembly. Worse case scenario you have to have or buy screws to fit

product_meta.title: Yaheetech 37-inch Portable & Foldable Manicure Table Nail Desk Workstation with Large Drawer/Client Wrist Pad/Controllable Wheels/Carrying Case for Spa Beauty Salon Black
feature_bullets: 【High Material】this portable manicure table station is constructed of high quality iron, plastic and　MDF material, sturdy and durable to use
【Large Size】spacious tabletop (37 x 17.3’’ tabletop) can keep all your items neat and tidy. It even has a really good size for personal use and professional mobile salon.
【Removable & Foldable】this manicure table nail desk is designed with removable & super-comfy wrist cushion and folding metal leg which is designed for space-saving.

【Lockable & Professional】4 lockable wheels for easy movement & static; Plastic drawer is perfect for keeping your accessories well organized; A waterproof zippered carry bag for convenient storage & easy transportation.
【Modern Design】This portable nail table station features stylish and fashionable design, which perfectly decorates your home and also adds a touch of elegant charm to your room
